text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/XhspozbgYH 

On Thursday 28 January 2021, 28,680 new cases and 1,239 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK.

A total of 7,447,199 people have now received the first dose of a #vaccine. https://t.co/XTZuNO77yH
